name: import-roi
label: Import ROIsba
description: A gear for importing metadata from a CSV file into flywheel objects
author: Flywheel SSE

mapping_column.description: Name of the column header that has the container ID's (Default is the first column)

first_row.description: The first row that contains data (usually the column headers)

metadata_destination.description:
The location of the metadata fields to be uploaded to under 'info'.
Defaults to CSV file name.
  Sub-categories are specified with a period, e.x. 'Health.InitialAssessment'

container_type.description:
The type of container listed in in the mapping column
 NOTE: (If mapping files, select the level of container the files are stored on, and check the 'attached_files' option)

gear_log_level.description: The level at which the gear will log.

attached_files.description: Check this if the objects are files attached to the container level specified in 'container_type'

dry_run.description: Only log what changes would be made, do not update anything.
